Introduction
This topic contains information on
RO responsibility for hearing administration
scheduling hearings
timely scheduling of hearings
providing advance notice of a hearing
cancellations and changing the date or type of hearing
reviewing the evidence prior to the hearing
,Â and
preparing to conduct the hearing
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D  - Regional Office (RO) Hearings
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D
